attributes.action: oppose HMRC office closures in Barrow, Kendal and Lancaster.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned are seriously concerned about the future of HM Revenue and Customs offices in Barrow, Lancaster and Kendal.
The proposal to close these offices will mean that local people and businesses will be left without access to these services. We are also concerned about the likelihood of staff affected by the closures being able to find alternative work within the local area. We support the PCS campaign to keep these offices open and urge the Government to withdraw the threat of closure.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
